text: Petr Hapka (13 May 1944 – 25 November 2014) was a Czech composer. He was one of the most important composers of Czech movie music industry. He was known for working with the lyricist Michal Horáček. He composed over 60 movies and 40 songs during his career. Hapka died in Okoř, Czech Republic, aged 70. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Czech composers Category:Czech musicians Category:Musicians from Prague
title: Petr Hapka
